title: Transportation: a ship comes home
creator_credit: Hudson Valley Film Productions and Manfred Kirchheimer
brief_description: Demonstrates the complexity of modern ocean transportation as we observe the exacting manoeuvres, expert timing, and the alertness to every shift of wind and current that are necessary to bring the majestic liner ‘The United States’ into port at New York harbour.
